page.title: 03CHILDRENS RECREATION,SEAHAM
page.content: IN SEAHAM WE HAVE A YOUTH CENTRE AND A LEISURE CENTRE.CHILDREN MAY ATTEND THE YOUTH CENTRE ON TUESDAY AND FRIDAY EVENINGS TO PARTAKE IN SUCH ACTIVITIES AS DANCING,ROLLER SKATING,FOOTBALL , NETBALL,COOKERY,ART & CRAFT ETC. AT THE LEISURE CENTRE THERE ARE FACILITIES FOR FOOTBALL(BOTH 11 AND 5 A SIDE , BADMINTON , SQUASH , TABLE TENNIS , WHEIGHTLIFTING AND BASKETBALL.DURING THE SCHOOL HOLIDAYS THE CENTRE PROVIDES A HOST OF SUPERVISED ACTIVITIES FOR SCHOOLCHILDREN.THESE INCLUDE GYMNASTICS,TRAMPOLINING,VIDEOS AND COMPUTER GAMES AND DANCE COMPETITIONS. A LOCAL LIBRARY PROVIDES A WIDE CHOICE OF READING MATERIALS.THERE ARE BROWNIES AND GUIDES FOR GIRLS AND CUBS AND SCOUTS FOR BOYS.AT DAWDON COLLIERY THERE IS A POND FOR SWIMMERS.
